statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT signal_id, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_color = 'Red';
SELECT location, timing_settings FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_id = 1;
SELECT signal_color FROM traffic_signals WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE timing_settings ->> '$.duration' = '30 seconds';
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_color = 'red';
SELECT location, signal_color FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY signal_id DESC;
SELECT signal_color, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE timing_settings->>'default_timing' = '10s';
SELECT signal_id, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE CAST(timing_settings->>'max_timing' AS INT) > 30;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT signal_id, location FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_color = 'red';
SELECT timing_start, timing_end FROM signal_timing WHERE timing_status = 'active';
SELECT location, timer_duration FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT signal_id, timing_start, timing_end FROM signal_timing WHERE timing_start > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timing_start ASC;
SELECT signal_id, location, signal_color FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE timer_duration > 10;
SELECT signal_id, signal_color FROM traffic_signals WHERE location = 'Main Street' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT timing_id, timing_start, timing_end FROM signal_timing WHERE timing_status = 'Active' ORDER BY timing_start ASC;
SELECT t.signal_id, t.location, s.timing_start, s.timing_end FROM traffic_signals t JOIN signal_timing s ON t.signal_id = s.signal_id WHERE s.timing_start >= NOW();
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, signal_type FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE signal_timing > 5;
SELECT id, intersection_name, latitude, longitude FROM Intersection_Coordinates WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM Traffic_Patterns WHERE pattern_timing < 10;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Patterns ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Lights ORDER BY location DESC, name ASC, signal_timing ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, signal_type FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE signal_timing > 10 ORDER BY signal_timing DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location, signal_type FROM Traffic_Lights WHERE location LIKE '%Square%' AND signal_timing < 15 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM Traffic_Patterns WHERE pattern_timing > 20 ORDER BY pattern_timing ASC, pattern_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Intersection_Coordinates WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -80.0 AND -70.0 LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT signal_id, location, timing_schedule FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT signal_id, signal_color FROM traffic_signals WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT * FROM signal_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM signal_history WHERE change_type = 'Maintenance' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY location DESC, signal_color ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, timing_schedule FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_color = 'Red';
SELECT signal_id, location, timing_schedule FROM traffic_signals WHERE timing_schedule LIKE '%am';
SELECT s.signal_id, s.location, h.date_time, h.change_type FROM traffic_signals s JOIN signal_history h ON s.signal_id = h.signal_id WHERE h.change_type = 'Maintenance';
SELECT s.*, l.log_description, l.log_time FROM traffic_signals s JOIN signal_logs l ON s.signal_id = l.signal_id WHERE l.log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals;
SELECT location, cycle_time FROM traffic_signals WHERE cycle_time > 30;
SELECT signal_id, location, green_time FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY green_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM signal_timing WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT camera_id, location, purpose FROM traffic_cameras WHERE purpose = 'monitoring';
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE cycle_time > 60 AND yellow_time = 30
SELECT location, cycle_time FROM traffic_signals ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, cycle_time FROM traffic_signals WHERE red_time < 20 ORDER BY cycle_time ASC
SELECT signal_id, location, green_time, red_time FROM traffic_signals WHERE cycle_time BETWEEN 60 AND 90
SELECT location, start_time, end_time FROM signal_timing WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
